appName.description: The title of the application, displayed in the web store.

appDesc.message: Generate calendar with all your facebook friends birthdays for the next two years.
appDesc.description: The description of the application, displayed in the web store.

FACEBOOK_REQUIRED.message:
You need to be on the facebook birthdays page in order to generate calendar.

Please follow the link below and click the icon again.
FACEBOOK_REQUIRED.description: Description in case user is not on the birthdays page.

FACEBOOK_REQUIRED_LINK_TITLE.description: Button to Facebook birthday page title.

NOT_SUPPORTED_LANGUAGE.message: Your facebook language is not supported. Please change it to: $languages$ And click the icon again.
NOT_SUPPORTED_LANGUAGE.description: Description in case facebook language is not supported

NOT_SUPPORTED_LANGUAGE_LINK.description: Facebook settings page with language set.

NOT_SUPPORTED_LANGUAGE_TITLE.description: Button to facebook settings page title.

WORKING.message:
Calendar generation has been started.
Page will be scrolled down till all the friends birthdays appear.
After that calendar will be generated and saved.
WORKING.description: Description when extraction process started successfully
